frame.name: Scope
frame.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Event</fen> is described in terms of the diversity of entities that are affected or considered in the <fen>Event</fen>. Alternatively a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> which enables or brings about the <fen>Event</fen> can be similarly described. <ex>The U.S. government believes that China has not revealed the full <t>scope</t> <fex name="Salient_entity">of its program</fex>.</ex> <ex>A key question is how U.S. deployment of ballistic missile defense will affect the pace and <t>scope</t> <fex name="Event">of Chinese strategic modernization</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that affects a set of entities.</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Salient_entity</fen> which is under discussion.</def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity which enables or causes the <fen>Event</fen> being judged.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: scope.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the number or variety of things affected or considered.
